Articles.Content:
I just switched over to 1.0.5. Dragged my 1.0.4 stuff (GameData folder, settings.cfg, and Folders under Saves) over to the new installation.

But I'm not seeing any of the new parts that are suppose to exist? It says 1.0.5 when I launch, and EVA kerbals do have track balls now. But no new parts.

Any help?

Edited November 14, 2015 by davidpsummers

Dragged my GameData folder

Wrong. Let it be as it was after fresh install. If you have mods, I have sad news, you have to wait until they're updated to be compatible with 1.0.5.
What's worse, there's a Squad folder in GameData.

Wrong. Let it be as it was after fresh install. If you have mods, I have sad news, you have to wait until they're updated to be compatible with 1.0.5.

Well, I guess its 1.0.4 for a bit.
Don't drag the Gamedata. It has all the parts. MechJeb isn't available as of 11/14/2015, and neither is Kerbal Engineer, but I'll make it.
you can do that trick if you just throw the mods in seperately and let the squad folder be. The chance all the mods will work though is nihil. Kerbal Alarm Clock, for example, did still work for me
What I need is Kerbal Alarm Clock and Kerbal Engineer. I can live without the others but I NEED those!

KAC seems working fine. KER at least runs, but it has some bugs (old hack no longer works because stock bug fixed, new fuel crossfeed logic needs to implement, etc.), so numbers should not be fully trusted.
